wikipedia_page.main: Major-General John David Moore-Bick CBE, DL (born 10 October 1949) is a former British Army officer who commanded United Kingdom Support Command (Germany).

response: Moore-Bick was born in Wales, the son of John Ninian Moore-Bick and his wife Kathleen (née Beall).‘MOORE-BICK, Rt Hon. Sir Martin (James)’, Who's Who 2017, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 2017; online edn, Oxford University Press, 2016 ; online edn, Nov 2016 accessed 29 June 2017   His younger brother, John Moore-Bick, is a retired major-general in the British Army.
